text: Læa phwk khea di phud wa “kha tæ phracea khxng rea!Khx phraxngkh di thrng thahı kar deinthang khxng rea yud yaw khun” læa phwk khea di xthrrm tx taw phwk khea xeng dangnan rea cung di thahı phwk khea pen reuxng lea khan tidtx kan ma læa rea di thahı phwk khea tæk slay kracad kk ra ca ykan xxk pi thæcring nı kar ni yxm pen sayyan xan mak hlay xyang nænxn kæ thuk khn phu xdthn phu ktayyu
